entry.string: This uses dynamic user settings, i.e. you can add/remove the user settings available to your users dynamically too. But you could use the 'normal' hard-coded approach here as well...
entry.translation: Thees uses dynemeec user setteengs, i.i. yuoo cun edd/remufe-a zee user setteengs efeeeleble-a tu yuoor users dynemeecelly tuu. Boot yuoo cuoold use-a zee 'nurmel' herd-cuded eppruech here-a es vell...
